TopicTitle: One song to describe the avatar above you.

Articles.Content:
Hello people,

Title says it all : **describe the avatar of the user above you with one song**.

Just post the song's name, or better, a link to the song.

example :

poster 1's avatar :

![366208KSPavatar03.jpg](http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/366208KSPavatar03.jpg)

poster 2's response :

**S.P.O.C.K.,** ***Abducted*** (1995)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VroODj71sQo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

---

Please, no mockery and respect the 
[Forum Rules](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/30064-Forum-Rules).

**Have fun** !
